rows.label: qst103903_msg0001
rows.name: Hey. You here to send somethin'?

rows.label: qst103903_msg0002
rows.name:
The amount that arrived was
way too small, you say?

rows.label: qst103903_msg0003
rows.name:
What, you think I'm skimming the
handling fees or something?

rows.label: qst103903_msg0004
rows.name:
I send Rex's money after it
builds up to around 90,000G.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0005
rows.name:
Iyasaki Village is a long way
off... Sending it in small
bits just racks up the fees.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0006
rows.name:
The Avaritia Trade Guild
takes a 2% fee... so for
90,000G, that's 1,800G.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0007
rows.name:
That means at least 88,200G
should have been sent from here.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0008
rows.name:
From my end, I hand it off
to a courier named Hugh
at the port in Torigo.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0009
rows.name:
There's no direct route to
Liberalitas, so we've got no
choice but to go via him.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0010
rows.name:
You should probably check the
fees with Hugh in Torigo, too.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0011
rows.name:
If something's fishy,
I'll help you out.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0012
rows.name:
After all, Rex, you're one
of my best customers.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0101
rows.name:
You might think the fees
are a little high, but...

rows.label: qst103903_msg0102
rows.name:
Cheap prices for good things
just mean someone somewhere
is getting screwed.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0103
rows.name: That's no way to do business.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0201
rows.name:
You want to set up a direct,
regular route between Avaritia
and Iyasaki Village?

rows.label: qst103903_msg0202
rows.name:
Hmm... There aren't enough
goods going to Iyasaki Village
to justify a daily run.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0203
rows.name:
But since it's you askin'...
I'll see what I can do.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0204
rows.name:
Alright! A once-a-week shipment to
Yeshiva Harbor should be possible!

rows.label: qst103903_msg0205
rows.name:
Whoa, whoa, hold on a
second. There's a problem.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0206
rows.name:
Unfortunately, I don't have a
Divine Beast ship that can
handle long-distance transport.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0207
rows.name:
If you guys can get a ship, I'll
start running the regular route.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0208
rows.name:
If you wanna buy a ship, talk
to the Nopon named Pukapu on
the Goldmund Flight Deck.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0209
rows.name:
If you wanna borrow one, I
hear a Nopon in Gula named
Umon will lend one out.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0210
rows.name:
It's a lot to ask, but...
it's for your hometown.
Give it your best shot.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0301
rows.name:
If you wanna buy a ship, talk
to the Nopon named Pukapu on
the Goldmund Flight Deck.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0302
rows.name:
If you wanna borrow one, I
hear a Nopon in Gula named
Umon will lend one out.

rows.label: qst103903_msg0303
rows.name:
I have faith that you
guys can pull it off.
